description: Given an array arr of 4 digits, find the latest 24-hour time that can be made using each digit exactly once. 24-hour times are formatted as "HH:MM", where HH is between 00 and 23, and MM is between 00 and 59. The earliest 24-hour time is 00:00, and the latest is 23:59. Return the latest 24-hour time in "HH:MM" format. If no valid time can be made, return an empty string.
